name: super pogo punk
description:
super pogo punk is a punk dance survival game

you play as a little girl who goes to a punk gig for the first time and wants to dance the famous pogo dance

controls:
- mouse in menu
- keyboard arrows on the dance floor

work in progress
working on more punks, gigs, songs, guts and different platform ports

made for #punkjam 2015 by Evil Indie Games 2015_04_13
